title: Amazing
text: Amazing app, and has the most features I’ve ever seen in an astrology app, let alone a free one! Just one thing though. How do I change my apps time zone out of LA? Can’t seem to find the setting.

title: Excellent app
text: This is a really great app and I am most appreciative for it. Thank you.

title: Beautiful & Useful
text: Gorgeous layout, useful features. The only app where you can view transit-to-natal AND transit-to-transit in the control centre widget which is a favourite feature of mine. Also love how Quintiles and BiQuintiles are included. Great transit timelines and informative aspect explanations. For a free app, it’s awesome. I would pay money for this app but it’s free!!

title: Very Handy
text: A really great application with loads of great features

title: What a gem!
text: Extremely helpful and informative. I can look up whatever I need, any time. It allows to see into the future and quickly arranges information in a succinct and useful way. Extremely well done, thank you developer! Keep good stuff coming

title: love it
text: hope to have more language option otherwise super good!! Keep up the good work

title: Great app
text:
Great looking and functional app. Lots of features to bring Astrology to life.
Great for transits.
Really nothing else on app store in its class.

Thanks
